msbt.message: I'm not gonna back off of my training just 'cause it's Lunar New Year. Gotta stay focused!
I love celebrating Lunar New Year with friends. We can do sit-ups, and push-ups, and maybe some squatsHuh? Of course that's what I always do. But now I wanna do it with my buddies, !
Celebrating two different kinds of new year means I get to do even more New Year's Squats!
How's your Lunar New Year going, ?Did you know moon rocks are SUPER heavy? I'd love to get some moon- rock free weights, !
I think I should come up with a workout tradition just for Lunar New YearOh! How about Lunar Lunges? Yeah! That sounds awesome! I'm gonna do a thousand, !
